metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18123 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The call parameter of /lib/exe/ajax.php in DokuWiki through 2017-02-19edoes not properly encode user input, which leads to a reflected filedownload vulnerability, and allows remote attackers to run arbitraryprograms.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dokuwiki - 0.0.20180422.a-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20180422.a-2').
